## Load Packages

```{r}
library(readr)
library(haven)
library(readxl)
```

## Read Files - I

```{r}
### Read R Data
load("./data/cars")
rds_data <- readRDS("./data/cars")

### Read CSV File
csv_data <- read_("./data/cars")
```

## Read Files - II

```{r}
### Read Excel Data
excel_data <- read_("./data/cars")

# Read SAS Data
sas_data <- read_("./data/cars")

### Read SPSS Data 
spss_data <- read_("./data/cars")

### Read Stata Files
stata_data <- read_("./data/cars")
```


## Write Files - I

```{r}
install.packages("writexl")

library(readr)
library(writexl)
library(haven)
```

```{r}
# write to RDA
save(cars, file = "./data/cars_data")

# write to RDS
saveRDS(cars, "./data/cars_data")

# write to CSV
write_(cars, "./data/cars_data")
```

## Write Files - II

```{r}
# write to Excel 
write_(cars, "./data/cars_data")

# write to SAS
write_(cars, "./data/cars_data")

# write to SPSS
write_(cars, "./data/cars_data")

# write to Stata
write_(cars, "./data/cars_data")
```
